title: Pheasant breast with pearl barley, glazed carrots and spiced dates
description: Impress your guests with this restaurant-style dish of pheasant, pearl barley and stuffed dates.
ingredients: 2 crowns of pheasant, cleaned and washed
5g fresh yeast mixed with 2 tbsp water
8 baby purple carrots, washed, tops removed and reserved
8 baby orange carrots, washed, tops removed and reserved
8 baby yellow carrots, washed, tops removed and reserved
salt and freshly ground black pepper
